Package dungeon

Class BasicDungeonXMLParser

java.lang.Object
dungeon.BasicDungeonXMLParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
DungeonParser
public class BasicDungeonXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements DungeonParser
Parse a basic dungeon from an XML file. Uses javax.xml.parsers and org.w3c.dom.
Author:
Mehdi
